## Source: ossf-package-analysis (a77979dac95c1a8949091ec8e71abdd7a44f015fa22fb348b6d27ba15e84f004)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'adandu' @ 92.6 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
